label: PaymentTradeSettlement
comment: The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

datatypeProperties.comment: A monetary value accepted for this payment trade settlement.
An additional textual description for this trade product.
A tax applicable to this header trade settlement.
The creation date, time, date time, or other date time value for this payment trade settlement.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value of the due date specified by these trade payment terms.
The financial guarantee identified for this payment trade settlement.
The identifier of the invoice payer assigned reference of this payment trade settlement.
A payee party for this header trade settlement.
The payer party for this header trade settlement.
A monetary value of a payment for this header trade settlement.
The currency exchange applicable to the payment in this header trade settlement.
The code specifying the currency for this payment trade settlement.
The penalty percentage related to this payment trade settlement.
The code specifying the priority for this header trade agreement.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value for the formal receipt of this referenced document.
A monetary value of the refund of this trade related tax, levy or duty.
A monetary value requested for this payment trade settlement.
The monetary summation totals specified for this payment trade settlement.
A monetary value of the tax related to this payment trade settlement.
The indication of whether or not this payment trade settlement includes a transfer fee.

referencedBy.comment: A payment trade settlement specified for this trade price.
